00051 bool Box::contains_point(boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> point) const {
00052     //Point is contained if:
00053     //this.x - width/2 <= point.x <= this.x + width/2 AND
00054     //this.y - height/2 <= point.y <= this.y + height/2 AND
00055     //this.z - depth/2 <= point.z <= this.z + depth/2
00056     //remember: position is the center point of the box
00057     /*
00058      * TODO implement using type Vector3d
00059     if( position_[0] - width_/2. <= point[0] && point[0] <= position_[0]+width_/2. &&
00060         position_[1] - height_/2. <= point[1] && point[1] <= position_[0]+height_/2. &&
00061         position_[2] - depth_/2.<= point[2] && point[2] <= position_[2]+depth_/2. )
00062         return true;
00063     else*/
00064         return false;
00065 }
